author: Reuters Editorial
title: Trump says some states have been 'too tough' on stay-at-home orders
description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday criticized the handling of some states' coronavirus mitigation measures, saying he found the stay-at-home orders of governors such as Virginia "too tough."
content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday criticized the handling of some states’ coronavirus mitigation measures, saying he found the stay-at-home orders of governors such as Virginia “too tough.”
